# Vikhlinin+ (2009) - https://arxiv.org/pdf/0805.2207.pdf
# Tables 1 and 2, Columns:
# (1) name
# (2) f_x [1e-11 cgs]
# (3) redshift
# (4) L_X total X-ray luminosity, 0.5-2.0 keV band, object frame [erg/s]
# (5) T_X average temperature from the spectrum in 0.15<R500<1 annulus [keV]
# (6) uncertainty on above
# (7) M_Y total mass M500 estimated from the Y_X parameter [1e14 msun]
# (8) uncertainty on above
# (9) M_G total mass M500 estimated from the integrated gas mass [1e14 msun]
# (10) uncertainty on above
# (11) M_T total mass M500 estimated from the Mtot-TX relation [1e14 msun]
# (12) uncertainty on above
# (13) merger? 1=yes, 0=no, approximate classification into mergers vs. relaxed clusters
#
# Table 1 "High-Redshift Sample"
